item.title: The Man Who Played With Hurricanes
item.description:
Today, the idea of controlling the weather is controversial. Scientists who research geoengineering have even received death threats. But once upon a time, people were optimistic about remaking the climate in entire regions of the world. They approached this science with a touching faith in the power of human creativity.

Absent-minded genius Irving Langmuir was one such scientist. He dreamt of making deserts bloom and conjuring rain from an arid sky... item.title: Tackle Your Next Chapter with Julie Moran
item.description: Our guest this week is sportscaster and journalist Julie Moran. Many will remember Julie as the weekend anchor for Entertainment Tonight or as the first female solo host for Wild World of Sports. Julie now hosts her own podcast and she joins us to ...
